text: Kim Kardashian shared several new images with her sister Kylie Jenner on Sunday. The ladies were seen side by side as they plugged the new winter color collaboration.'The KKW X KYLIE II collab is now on KKWBEAUTY. COM 4 new lips in deep rich tones!'wrote Kim in the caption. And the women also both offered a 30 % discount on their own lines, KKW Beauty and Kylie Cosmetics, for Cyber Monday.
